QuestData.Title: The Story of Huln
QuestData.Description:
You work to unite the tribes. That is no small task. It has only been done once before in the history of this mountain.
Huln Highmountain last united the tribes thousands of years ago to take on the Legion during the War of the Ancients.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Spiritwalker Ebonhorn to learn about Huln Highmountain.
QuestData.CompletionText: The history of this place extends beyond our limited memory.
QuestData.RewardText: You have seen only a taste of what Huln Highmountain accomplished during his lifetime. Let us delve deeper into the past...
